description: 4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated steel bullets. This bullet has been imbued by a druid's will and pollen will explode on landing, which can blind and slow.
4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated steel bullets. This bullet has been magically shaped by an Earthshaper to turn into fragments upon impact.
4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated steel bullets. This bullet has been imbued with fire from a Kelvinist.
4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated steel bullets. This bullet has been imbued with ice from a Kelvinist and will try to freeze enemies in place.
4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated steel bullets. This bullet has been imbued with lightning from a Stormshaper and will bounce from enemy to enemy.
4.6x30mm ammunition with 31gr copper plated steel bullets. This bullet has been tinkered with by a technomancer to corrupt robotics.
